original_text: But the sailors did not do what Jonah said. Instead, they tried to use oars to drive the ship back to the land. But the storm was too strong and they could not do that.
korean_text: 그러나 그 사람들이 힘써 노를 저어 배를 육지로 돌리고자 하다가 바다가 그들을 향하여 점점 더 흉용하므로 능히 못한지라

sentences.original_text: But the sailors did not do what Jonah said.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 선원들은 요나가 말한 것을 하지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: Instead, they tried to use oars
to drive the ship back to the land.
But the storm was too strong
and they could not do that.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그것을 할 수 없었습니다.
